meanings.sent1: The slimy, ickiest bug crawled across the floor.
meanings.sent2: That moldy sandwich is the ickiest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The ickiest smell from the garbage made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The ickiest feeling of dread crept over her as she entered the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The ickiest taste of spoiled milk lingered in his mouth for hours.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of disgust or revulsion
meanings.sent1: The rotten eggs emitted the ickiest odor imaginable.
meanings.sent2: The dirty public restroom was the ickiest place she had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The ickiest sight of a squirming worm made her shiver in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The ickiest sound of nails on a chalkboard made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent5: The ickiest touch of slimy seaweed made her recoil in horror.

meanings.sent1: The ickiest is often found in the darkest corners of the forest.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the ickiest of all the creepy crawlies.
meanings.sent3: The ickiest in the haunted house turned out to be a fake spider.
meanings.sent4: The ickiest at the party was the mysterious green dip.
meanings.sent5: The ickiest in the story was the villain who enjoyed causing harm.
